Plot: An exploration of the last quarter century of the great, if eccentric, British painter J.M.W. Turner's life.
Title: Mr. Turner
Actors: Timothy Spall, Paul Jesson, Dorothy Atkinson, Marion Bailey
tomatoConsensus: Led by a masterful performance from Timothy Spall and brilliantly directed by Mike Leigh, Mr. Turner is a superior Hollywood biopic.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 55 nominations.
